title: General
stimulusHtml:
6 points maximum

One point for each of the following explanations/identifications

  • Description of the role of tRNA in the transport of amino acids

  • Description of the ribosome/rRNA

  • Peptide bond formation (or the connecting of amino acids into a polypeptide chain)

  • Concept of codon-anticodon binding

  • Concept of the role of the genetic code (e.g., mRNA bases determine the sequence of amino acids)

  • Description of stages (initiation, elongation, and termination)

  • Elaboration point for a detailed explanation—examples of acceptable answers include, but are not limited to, the following:

    • Description of 40S and 60S ribosomal subunits

    • Role of aminoacyl-tRNA synthetase

    • Structure of tRNA

    • Use of GTP as energy source
